summary: Implements a generic, extensible factory mechanism for constructing PyTorch layers in a dimension‑independent way. A central registry maps symbolic names to callables that return layer classes or instances, and helper factories expose common layer types (convolution, pooling, normalization, activation, etc.) so that networks can request a layer by name and required arguments such as spatial dimension.
business_intent: Provide MONAI users with a flexible, configurable way to build medical imaging neural networks where layer types can be swapped or parameterized without changing model code, supporting multi‑dimensional data and optional optimizations.
